resources.string: Hi, my name is Petar I love to do some sports and go out with my friends but it is a real pleasure for me to read books, learn new technologies and to solve problems
With my current level of ability in Android and Java development I could be very helpful to Flat Rock Technology team and I am going further with preparation for Oracle Certified Programmer
Also my diverse background could be very helpful in the communication with the customers and defining their needs
Do you want to leave the app?
